mapper.select: select entrp_nm as entrpNm , id as id from breadstore limit 4732, 5000
mapper.insert: insert into breadstoremenu (id, menu_nm, menu_price) value (#{id}, #{menuNm}, #{menuPrice})
mapper.select: select a.entrp_nm as entrpNm ,a.load_addr as loadAddr ,a.city_do_cd as cityDoCd ,a.city_gn_gu_cd as cityGuguCd ,a.xpos_lo as xposIo ,a.ypos_la as yposIa ,a.area_nm as areaNm ,a.homepage_url as homepageUrl ,a.tel_no as telNo ,a.reprsnt_menu_nm as reprsntMenuNm ,a.menu_pc as menuPc ,a.base_ymd as baseYmd ,a.id as id ,a.business_hours as businessHours ,a.image as image from breadstore a where a.id=#{id}
select b.menu_nm as menuNm ,b.menu_price as menuPrice from breadstore a right outer join breadstoremenu b on a.id=b.id where a.id=#{id}
select count(*) as listCnt from breadstore

select entrp_nm as entrpNm ,load_addr as loadAddr ,city_do_cd as cityDoCd ,city_gn_gu_cd as cityGuguCd ,xpos_lo as xposIo ,ypos_la as yposIa ,area_nm as areaNm ,homepage_url as homepageUrl ,tel_no as telNo ,reprsnt_menu_nm as reprsntMenuNm ,menu_pc as menuPc ,base_ymd as baseYmd ,id as id ,image as image from breadstore where xpos_lo like CONCAT(#{xposIo}, '%') and ypos_la like CONCAT(#{yposIa}, '%')

select a.id ,a.content ,a.star ,a.create_date ,b.nickname ,b.id as userKey from breadstorereview a inner join user b on a.user_key=b.id where a.bread_store_key = #{id} and a.delete_yn='N' order by a.id desc

mapper.select: select a.id, a.user_key, a.title, a.category_key, b.id, b.url from contents a left outer join contents_img b on a.id=b.content_id where a.category_key=1 and bakery_key=#{id} group by a.id order by a.id desc
